page.title: 06Clubs and Societies
page.content: There are many clubs and societies,membership of which is available to Longfield residents. Gravesend Choral and Operatic Society seeks members,subject to a voice test. For those who like to walk,there is the Gravesham Rights of Way Committee;the Kent Trust for Nature Conservation;Meopham and District Bridleways Association;North Kent Wildlife Preservation Society,and Istead Rise Footpaths Group. Istead Rise Floral Art Group and Istead Rise Horticultural Association exist for those with green fingers or a love of flowers. For the very young there are Cub,Brownie,Scout and Guide Groups and a B.M.X.Club. The 402 (Gavesend) Air Training Corps exists for youngsters who like action,as does the Judo "Nandokwai" Club.
